Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Acalabrutinib maleate monohydrate is approved to treat adults with:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Chronic lymphocytic leukemia or small lymphocytic lymphoma.

Mantle cell lymphoma. It is used:with bendamustine hydrochloride and rituximab in patients whose cancer has not been treated and who cannot receive an autologous stem cell transplantalone in patients who have received at least one other type of treatment

Section.Para: Acalabrutinib maleate monohydrate is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
